name: MessageMedia
overview:
MessageMedia’s Business SMS services enable clients to communicate with customers and staff in a simple and economical way, with its reputation being built on technical expertise, industry experience, quality support and service reliability.

Established in response to the emergence of SMS as a communication tool in early 2000, MessageMedia’s founders, including Australian technology entrepreneur and current CEO, Grant Rule, recognised the opportunity presented by this fledgling technology.

MessageMedia’s commitment to innovation and service has seen it lead the industry through the growth stage of SMS to become Australia’s largest specialist corporate SMS provider. As with its first product, all MessageMedia Business SMS solutions are developed in-house.

MessageMedia owns its technology, enabling it to impose its own rigorous standards at every stage of the software development process. Australian carriers back MessageMedia SMS traffic and it guarantees its customers carrier grade reliability. Its systems constantly monitor delivery speeds to all networks and its messaging traffic is dynamically routed to ensure the fastest possible delivery time and 100% reliability.

MessageMedia is active in almost every business sector in Australia, including finance and banking, healthcare, education, Government, retail, emergency services, hospitality and travel, real estate, trade services, health and fitness and sporting clubs and associations.
